item.title: Can easily cause someone to trip over, 10th December
item.description:
Pavement is uneven might be from a tree being cut further down but it is very easy for someone to trip and my manager has fallen recently so I am very aware how bad a fall can be.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Hercules Road, Lambeth, Greater London

item.title: Broken rear light & several PCN’s issued, 10th December
item.description:
Hasn’t moved for months with a broker offside rear light (and scuffs and scratches) with several PCN’s also issued to it. Seems it has been abandoned considering this street is quite and known for these actions previously
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hows Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of trash, 10th December

item.title: Hazardous sloped pavement outside Vetro Building on Clere Street, EC2A 4LL posing a risk for prams, wheelchairs, and reduced-mobility residents., 10th December
item.description:
The pavement outside the building is uneven and sloped, making access unsafe for prams and mobility users. A newly opened hotel nearby has had its footpath resurfaced, showing this area has not been maintained to the same safety standard.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clere Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of dog poo, 10th December
item.description:
I reported these multiple bags of dog poo that someone had thrown in the alley yesterday and had a note back to say it had been fixed but they are still there. See photos from just now. E.g. right under the black lamppost in the middle of the alley.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victor Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road needs cleaning, 10th December
item.description:
Our end of the road never gets cleaned and there are now lot of leaves that need removing and bits of rubbish, that are in danger of blocking the drains situated in the turning circle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Leamington Close, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two single bed bases dumped, 10th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Southgate, Greater London

item.title: Dead Fox on Shooters Hill/ Stratheden Road Junction, 10th December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shooters Hill Road, Blackheath
